main_definition: A pleasing or attractive quality that can describe both people and things, often invoking feelings of happiness and admiration.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Beautiful in appearance, pleasant to look at
meanings_and_examples.example: The sunset over the ocean was truly lovely.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Enjoyable and delightful, bringing pleasure or happiness
meanings_and_examples.example: Spending time with her friends is always a lovely experience for me.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Charming and attractive, especially in terms of personality
meanings_and_examples.example: She has such a lovely personality that everyone likes to be around her.
The ballet dancer moved with such loveliness, it was mesmerizing to watch.
